name: graph_onedrive_createFolder
description: Create a new folder in OneDrive inside a specific parent folder path. userId can be null or empty. If driveId is null or empty, send 'me'. If parentPath is empty, send default as root which is '/'. If not already present, body needs to include an attribute named folder as empty object attribute to signify its a folder. If @microsoft.graph.conflictBehavior is not mentioned, send 'rename' as default value.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the owner user (UPN or ID).

driveId.description: Unique identifier of the drive where the folder will be created.

parentPath.description: Path of the parent folder inside the drive where the new folder should be created (e.g., Documents/Reports). Use empty string or omit for root.

name.description: The name of the new folder.

folder.description: Indicates that the item is a folder. Must be an empty object {}.

responseTemplate: Folder '{{name}}' created in OneDrive at path {{parentPath}} (mock).

name: graph_onedrive_deleteFileOrFolder
description: Delete a file or folder in One Drive. userId can be null or empty. If driveId is null or empty, send 'me'.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user (UPN or ID).

itemId.description: The ID of the file to delete.

responseTemplate: File or folder with ID '{{itemId}}' deleted from OneDrive (mock).

name: graph_onedrive_listAllFiles
description: List all files in One Drive for specified path. userId can be null or empty. If driveId is null or empty, send 'me'. If no folder path is specified by user, send '/' as default

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user (UPN or ID).

folderPath.description: The folder path inside the drive (e.g., Documents/Reports/2025).

name: graph_onedrive_moveFileOrFolder
description: Move a file or folder in OneDrive to a different folder within the same drive or another drive. userId can be null or empty. If driveId is null or empty, send 'me'.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the owner user (UPN or ID).

driveId.description: Unique identifier of the drive containing the file.

itemId.description: The ID of the file or folder to move.

parentReference.description: Reference to the new parent folder (where the file will be moved).

driveId.description: Target drive ID (if moving across drives).

name.description: Optional new name for the file after moving.

responseTemplate: File or folder with ID '{{itemId}}' moved to new location in OneDrive (mock).

name: graph_onedrive_shareFileOrFolder
description: Share a file or folder in One Drive. userId can be null or empty. If driveId is null or empty, send 'me'.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the owner user (UPN or ID).

itemId.description: The ID of the file/folder to share.

recipients.description: List of users to share the file with (email addresses).

roles.description: Permissions to grant. Allowed values: read, write.

message.description: Optional message to include in the invitation.

responseTemplate: File or folder with ID '{{itemId}}' shared in OneDrive (mock).
